alert.note: Alert for Carver; McLeod; Meeker; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wright, southeastern Meeker, McLeod and northwestern Carver Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Silver Lake, or 6 miles northeast of Hutchinson, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winsted around 740 PM CDT. Cokato and Howard Lake around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Annandale, Buffalo and Maple Lake. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 110 and 138. U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 116 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
